sentences.sCn: 布里奇特不能来了，她生病了。

sentences.sContent: He was unable to join the army because of ill health.
sentences.sCn: 他因为身体不好没法参军。

sentences.sContent: The animals had been grossly ill-treated.
sentences.sCn: 那些动物受到了恣意虐待。

sentences.sContent: ...my contract wasn't renewed and I plunged further into new depths of ill health...
...How long would it be before I sank into ill health and depression again...
...The 10-hour days crashed around my head; no amount of make-up could disguise my ill health as I battled against the odds to prove to myself that I could still make it in the business world...
...as partners are more likely to become ill or die in the couple of years following their spouse’s death...

synos.tran: 生病的；坏的；邪恶的；不吉利的

phrases.pCn: 难受；感到不适；感觉病了
非法得到的钱财；不义之财
不安的，担心的；不舒服的
不畅快；局促不安；心神不宁

words.tran: 不完美地；困难的；不善地，坏地

trans.tranOther: suffering from a disease or not feeling well
badly or in an unpleasant way
